description: BIDI mode baseline - get_location with approval flow (MULTI-REQUEST: confirmation + execution)
source: Synthesized from get_location-approved-sse-baseline (BIDI produces identical SSE-format events)
scenario: User approves get_location tool call - complete flow from confirmation request to successful execution
note: This fixture captures TWO separate HTTP requests: (1) Initial request ending with confirmation [DONE], (2) Approval response ending with execution [DONE]. It serves as documentation of the complete approval flow, not for single-stream transport testing. Transport tests verify one [DONE] per stream.

toolConfirmation.hint: Please approve or reject the tool call get_location() by responding with a FunctionResponse with an expected ToolConfirmation payload.
